quotes.quote: I'm not lazy, I'm on energy-saving mode.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I used to think I was indecisive, but now I'm not so sure.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I'm on a seafood diet. I see food and I eat it.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I don't mean to interrupt people. I just randomly remember things and get really excited.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: My bed is a magical place where I suddenly remember everything I was supposed to do.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: The trouble with being punctual is that nobody's there to appreciate it.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: I'm not clumsy. It's just the floor hates me, the tables and chairs are bullies, and the walls get in my way.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I exercise every morning. Absolutely nothing is wrong with my lying skills.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: My people skills are just fine. It's my tolerance for idiots that needs work.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I don't need a hairstylist. My pillow gives me a new hairstyle every morning.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: The easiest way to find something lost around the house is to buy a replacement.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I'm not short, I'm concentrated awesome.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: You know you're an adult when you get excited about a new vacuum cleaner.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: Common sense is like deodorant. The people who need it most never use it.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I'm not saying I'm Batman. I'm just saying no one has ever seen me and Batman in the same room.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: A clear conscience is usually the sign of a bad memory.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I'm not a complete idiot, some parts are missing.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I'm not procrastinating. I'm just doing side quests.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I'm not a morning person. If you want to see me at my best, come back after noon.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I'm not a hoarder, I'm just extremely helpful in case anyone needs 17 empty margarine tubs.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I'm not old, I'm retro.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just passionately expressing my point of view while being completely right.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I don't make mistakes. I create unexpected learning opportunities.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: My brain has two modes: Forget everything and remember that embarrassing thing you did 10 years ago.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I'm not ignoring you, I'm just assembling my reply in my head.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I'm not a control freak. Now, can you please move? You're standing too close to the line I drew.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I'm not saying I'm Wonder Woman, I'm just saying no one has ever seen me and Wonder Woman in the same room.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I'm not a vegetarian because I love animals. I'm a vegetarian because I hate plants.
quotes.author: A. Whitney Brown

quotes.quote: I'm not great at advice. Can I interest you in a sarcastic comment?
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: My favorite exercise is a cross between a lunge and a crunch. It's called lunch.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I don't suffer from insanity. I enjoy every minute of it.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I have a hobby. I have the world's largest collection of sea shells. I keep it scattered on beaches all over the world. Maybe you've seen it.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I'm not lazy, I'm just very relaxed.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I'm not procrastinating. I'm just prioritizing my immediate happiness.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I am so good at sleeping I can do it with my eyes closed.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: My brain is 90% song lyrics, 8% worry, and 2% remembering to put the laundry in the dryer.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I'm not lazy, I'm in energy-saving mode.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I have a GPS in my car. It keeps telling me to 'proceed to the route.' I'm already on the route! What does it want from me?!
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I'm not a hoarder, I'm a collector of potential future usefulness.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: My social security number is 1. Because I'm the first person you should call.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I'm not clumsy. The floor is just uneven, the tables are out to get me, and the walls jump in front of me.
quotes.author: Ninja Type

quotes.quote: I'm not a morning person. I'm a 'need several coffees before I can even remember my own name' person.
quotes.author: Ninja Type
